attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government HAS to stop meddling in the emotional consequences of children being adopted by single sex couples. THEY ARE NOT 'GOODS OR CHATTLES' !!
The CHURCHES, BOTH CATHOLIC AND OF ENGLAND SHOULD BE ALLOWED AND TO  BE RESPECTED FOR THEIR MORALS AND BELIFES - the same as ALL other Religions (WHICH SEEMS TO BE SO PC !!) THE SAFETY AND WELL-BEING OF CHILDREN IS PARAMOUNT.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
